title: 2048 Game
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Slide tiles to merge matching numbers and create the 2048 tile. A simple but addictive puzzle game
reactions: This game is licensed as public domain by Axiologic Research, and a gift to Albert-David Alboaie by the founder of Axiologic Research.
Feel free to copy and improve this game. Contact us on https://ploinky.com/addgame to review and include your games in our public suite. Make nice games for your children!

title: Lights Out (3×3)
author: Ploynky
essence: Toggle tiles to turn off all lights. Each tap flips neighbors — solve the 3×3 board in as few taps as possible
reactions: This game is licensed as public domain by Axiologic Research, and a gift to Albert-David Alboaie by the founder of Axiologic Research.

title: Sudoku
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: The classic logic puzzle. Fill the 9x9 grid so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3x3 subgrids contain all of the digits from 1 to 9
reactions: This game is licensed as public domain by Axiologic Research, and a gift to Albert-David Alboaie by the founder of Axiologic Research.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe (vs Random)
author: Ploynky
essence: Play X vs a simple random AI. Win, lose, or draw — each game takes seconds
